title: How to watch Young Boys vs Man United: live stream Ronaldo in the Champions League now

summary: CR7 and co kick off their Champions League campaign in Bern
article: After a disappointing showing in last season's Champions League, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and his reinforced Reds will be hoping to get this year's campaign off to a winning start. Discover how to watch a Young Boys vs Man United live stream and catch all the action from the UCL, no matter where you are in the world today - including ways that you can watch for FREE.

United failed to reach the knockout stage last time out, but with a forward line bolstered by new signings Cristiano Ronaldo and Jadon Sancho, coupled with the added strength at the back provided by defender Raphaël Varane, there are big expectations at Old Trafford for a much longer run this season.
The Reds made the perfect preparation for tonight's game by thrashing Newcastle at home on Saturday in a match that saw Ronaldo score a brace on his second debut for the club.

They kick-off their Group F campaign this evening with a trip to Swiss Super League Champions Young Boys. Now managed by former Huddersfield boss David Wagner, the Bern outfit made it through the qualifying phase to set up tonight's match, but have otherwise been in underwhelming form domestically.
Will Ronaldo and Rashford be able to take advantage of a nervy Swiss backline? Here's how to watch a Champions League Young Boys vs Man United live stream today from anywhere in the world.
